title: Experimental Team Composition Training Program for Enhancing Teamwork Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on developing collaborative problem-solving skills in mathematics for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively collaborate with team members of diverse learning styles to solve mathematical problems.
Learners can lead the problem-solving process by performing the role of a coordinator within a team.
Learners can analyze team contribution through peer evaluation and establish improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
